overview: Viktor has problems: with work, with his son, because of his son. From worries, he runs away into the forest, settles away from everyone, in a secluded house. Once on a hunt, due to a cartridge exploding in a gun, he loses his sight. Now Viktor needs not only to survive and get out of the unfriendly forest, he will have to feel the brunt of loneliness and realize the burden of real problems.
title: To the Touch
